articles.author: Adam Starkey
articles.title: Tom Hardy "wouldn't engage" with Star Trek: Nemesis cast, says Patrick Stewart - NME
articles.description: Hardy played the villain in the 2002 film
articles.content:
Patrick Stewart has recalled working with odd and challenging Tom Hardy on the set of Star Trek: Nemesis.
The Jean-Luc Picard actor detailed his experience working on the particularly weak 2002 film… [+1413 chars]
